productive.translation[0].definitions[0]: Most of us are more productive in the morning.
productive.translation[0].definitions[1]: relating to the production of goods, crops, or wealth
productive.translation[1].definitions[0]: The program is designed to help business users be more productive.
We want to turn welfare recipients into productive, working members of society.
The plant has the newest and most productive steel-making technology.
productive.translation[1].definitions[1]: The strike is cutting deeper into the company’s productive capacity (=ability to produce things).
